title: Minh Long - Showroom Qu·∫≠n 3
address: 17 B√† Huy·ªán Thanh Quan, Ph∆∞·ªùng V√µ Th·ªã S√°u, Qu·∫≠n 3, H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh 700000

reviews.name: Paulina Kosmowska-Monroy
reviews.review:
An absolute pleasure to shop there. Amazing quality table ware; we bought about 16 kg of bowls, plates, tea sets, and various dishes, which is already sitting nicely in our kitchen cabinets, per attached photos. Service was incredible. Extremely helpful and honest staff; we received lots of suggestions, and were informed when, for example, certain dishes would not be microwave or dishwasher safe. All items were packed in such way that they survived two plane trips, one 12.5h and one 2h, undelicate handling by airport staff, and the taxi drivers. Not a single item was broken.

Prices are a bit high, but the products are really worth it. In the UK we would likely have paid four or five times the price for these products. We paid about GBP 130 for a tea set with six cups and saucers, seven-item set of tableware consisting of plates, soup bowls, spoons, with a matching set of tea/coffee pot, with seven cups and saucers, sugar and cream bowls, two big oval plates for serving food, a matching soup tureen, and another bigger soup tureen.

I attached photos of some (but not all) items, mainly due to laziness to take the tureens out of cupboards :-)

reviews.name: Jimmy Nguyen
reviews.review: Dung/Julie is the best seller in Minh Long Showroom Q3. She knows all the materials and information you could possibly need or want. There was no question she couldn‚Äôt answer and even ordered items for us from other stores so we can see samples. I would highly recommend finding her if you come her and have her show you around. Summer  July/2024

reviews.name: Pierre Relave
reviews.review:
Lousy!

I have been a customer of Minh Long for more than five years. So far everything had gone pretty well. I must have spent around 50 million VND with them. I am not a major customer but I am a regular customer.
I recently placed an order for my restaurant for around 10 million VND. Then I realized that I was missing some items so I contacted the sales representative. In his response he clarified that I would have to pay the delivery costs because this last order is less than 5 million VND (the cost of delivery between district 3 and district 1 is a maximum of 50,000 VND, i.e. 2 euros). I asked the salesman if he was joking and he told me no.
A few days later, I stopped by the store and asked to see the manager to talk about this. When I told her I thought it was pathetic to charge a regular customer like me for shipping, she just looked at me and laughed in my face and said it was company policy.
So this is how we treat customers at Minh Long. You saved 50,000 VND and made fun of me. You won't see me anymore.

reviews.name: Tuan Hoang
reviews.review: The store is located on Ba Huyen Thanh Quan Street, District 3. Underground parking. The product display store is located on the ground floor. Products mainly serve family needs: dinnerware sets, tea sets, a few decorative products... Diverse products for popular, medium and high-end categories. Products are available for sale on site. Safe and quality packaging. You can pay by cash or card. Staff are attentive, polite, and professional.
